WorkItem.Description:
As a note to http://rawr.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=16951
 
As a slight tempering in the poster's favour...  The "issues" page doesn't have posting guidelines, only the discussions page has them, granted that one refers to posting issues as well, but it's a 2 step thing.  Is it possible to have a link/explanation on the "create new issue" page ?   Maybe even outline how to set a proper title so it includes what part of rawr the issue deals with ?
 
As to the bug report guidelines:
http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=BugReportingFormatGuide&referringTitle=PostingGuidelines
It doesn't mention anywhere that people should post their character files, and/or when the character files would be relevant (not all issues will be helped by posting them as well).
The guidelines probably need to be amended, don't slap people on the head for not posting their character files right away when it's not mentioned anywhere they should do so. :-)

Comments.Message:
No, it's not possible for us to change/add anything to the issue tracker pages.

And the Bug Reporting Format Guide doesn't mention your character, but the posting guidelines certainly do. Will add it there though.
